en: Shift your weight evenly between both feet.

ru: Руки поднимайте через стороны и сложите ладони над головой.
en: Raise the hands along sides and fold the palms above the head.

ru: Кисти с силой сжимайте и опустите на уровень грудной клетки
en: On the exhale, press your palms together firmly and lower them to chest level.
Tad+asana.
Mountain Pose.

ru: Вариант с кистями, сложенными в намасте.
en: A variation with the hands folded in Namaste position.

ru: Все мышцы тела в легком тонусе.
en: All the muscles of the body are in light tonus.

ru: Кисти поместите на бёдра или колени.
en: Place your hands on your thighs or knees, allowing your arms to rest naturally.
Bend your knees slightly.
Place your hands at the edges of the mat.

ru: Опустите на коврик колени и поставьте их на ширине плеч.
en: Lower your knees to the mat and position them shoulder-width apart.
Lower your pelvis between your knees.
If necessary, use a block.

ru: Ладони сложите в намасте перед грудной клеткой.
en: Put the palms together in namaste in front of the chest.
Close your eyes.

ru: Наблюдайте за каждым вдохом и за каждым выдохом.
en: Follow each inhalation and each exhalation.

ru: Если внимание уходит в сторону, мягко возвращайте внимание на дыхание.
en: If your focus drifts, guide it back to your breath.
Take a moment to observe the rhythm of your breath.
Pay attention to how your body feels as you breathe. Notice the rise and fall of your chest, the sensation of air passing through your nose, and the feeling of relaxation spreading through you.
Allow your breath to return to its normal rhythm. Sit quietly for a moment, noticing how you feel.
When you’re ready, open your eyes or shift your attention back to your surroundings.
